• `e` → right-third
• `u` → top-left-quarter

• `c` → center
• `r` → reasonable-size
• `f` → toggle-fullscreen
• `-` → make-smaller
• `=` → make-larger
• `,` → previous-display
• `.` → next-display
• `[` → previous-desktop
